title: cygan

content: today i am raffling the following 2 magazines for freeThe Little Hodler Comic (lot 1) and Einundzwanzig (lot 2)both magazines are in new unused condition rules:choose a number between 0-99users with the rank 'newbies' are excluded from the free rafflethe raffle starts when all numbers have been selected and i have chosen a BTC-blockif a user posts another spot after the announcement of the BTC-block which determines the winner, he will be excluded by me for the next raffles.its possible to win both magazines with one spot freeshipping worldwide - the magazine shipped from eu00 - shasan01 - PeakDK02 - willi997403 - dcarter04 - bullrun2020bro05 - 5tift06 - TopTort77707 - WhyFhy08 - thiago00709 - Real-Duke10 - tread9311 - The_Crypto_Kid12 - mx12.levins13 - Verndog14 - 15 - sunnybwoy16 -17 - Mbitr18 - 19 - Maus072820 -21 - av8rjeff22 - Frank AlpenCoin23 - LDL24 - 25 - Woodie26 -27 - Humble Bitcoiners28 - bct_ail29 - 30 - turbodogma31 - 32 - 33 - montreal134 - 35 -36 - CLS6337 - Dernoste38 -39 - 40 - bitcoiner24h41 - tweetious42 - YodasRedRocket43 -44 - hotdog745 -46 -47 - 48 -49 - 50 - Helena Yu51 -52 - 53 -54 - 55 - Darker4556 - Remsjack57 -58 -59 -60 - 61 - 62 -63 - BTCOVERFIATS64 - HeRetiK65 -66 - raritycheck67 - Amax1668 - 69 -70 - Markzellers71 - onecall12372 -73 - ca33374 - Honeybadger201475 -76 - MoparMiningLLC77 - bitbollo78 - 79 - Crytocanuk80 - krogothmanhattan81 - CoinageMint82 -83 - haloxon84 - Koal-8485 -86 -87 - Crypto Library88 - Buchi-8889 - 90 - tranthidung91 -92 -93 - 94 - PreciousMetapsICT95 -96 - CoinEraser97 - doblezero98 - JanEmil99 - minerjones
